title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI-powered co-sell: Unlock partner success with AWS Partner Central  (PEX113)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI驱动的联合销售：通过AWS合作伙伴中心释放合作伙伴成功潜力 (PEX113)
abstract: Discover how to supercharge your co-selling efforts with enhancements available in AWS Partner Central. This session showcases new AI-enhanced features and APIs that streamline partner collaboration and deal registration. Learn to leverage secure access to APIs, access real-time insights, and automate workflows to accelerate your go-to-market strategy. Whether you're a seasoned AWS Partner or just getting started, you'll walk away with actionable steps to maximize Partner benefits and drive revenue growth with AWS through Partner Central.
abstract_cn: 了解如何通过AWS合作伙伴中心的增强功能来提升您的联合销售工作。本次会议展示了新的AI增强功能和API，可简化合作伙伴协作和交易注册。学习如何利用API的安全访问，获取实时洞察，并自动化工作流程以加速您的市场推广策略。无论您是经验丰富的AWS合作伙伴还是刚刚起步，您都将获得可操作的步骤，以最大化合作伙伴权益并通过合作伙伴中心推动AWS收入增长。
